      CurrencyAmount sum(block(elt:SolrInputField):CurrencyAmount mapper)
      Sums up the values of the target of the mapper argument. Returns null if the array is empty, since the currency cannot be determined. Note: this behavior is different from that of other sum methods, where zero is returned.
